import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:8088/api';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add token to requests if available
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// Handle responses
api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{var _error$response;if(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.status)===401){localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('refreshToken');window.location.href='/login';}return Promise.reject(error);});// Auth API
export const authAPI={register:data=>api.post('/register',data),login:data=>api.post('/login',data),getProfile:()=>api.get('/profile'),updateProfile:data=>api.put('/profile',data)};// Services API
export const servicesAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/services'),getById:id=>api.get("/services/".concat(id)),create:data=>api.post('/services',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/services/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/services/".concat(id))};// Availability API
export const availabilityAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/availability'),getByDay:dayOfWeek=>api.get("/availability/".concat(dayOfWeek)),create:data=>api.post('/availability',data),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/availability/".concat(id),data),delete:id=>api.delete("/availability/".concat(id))};// Appointments API
export const appointmentsAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/appointments'),getById:id=>api.get("/appointments/".concat(id)),getByDateRange:(startDate,endDate)=>api.get('/appointments/date-range',{params:{startDate,endDate}}),create:data=>api.post('/appointments',data),updateStatus:(id,status)=>api.put("/appointments/".concat(id,"/status"),null,{params:{status}}),delete:id=>api.delete("/appointments/".concat(id)),confirmPublic:token=>api.post("/appointments/public/confirm/".concat(token)),cancelPublic:token=>api.post("/appointments/public/cancel/".concat(token))};// Public booking API
export const publicBookingAPI={getProfile:businessId=>api.get("/public/booking/".concat(businessId)),createAppointment:(businessId,data)=>api.post("/public/booking/".concat(businessId,"/appointments"),data)};// Analytics API
export const analyticsAPI={getAnalytics:()=>api.get('/analytics')};export default api;
